label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_010
content:
## 2024-05-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 103
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 17
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 26
- Mid Dose: 26
- High Dose: 26
- Placebo: 29

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 63.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 105.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 156.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 114.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 30.1
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 103.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 31.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 161.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 243.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 175.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 37.0
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 141.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 39.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 230.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 352.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 246.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 56.7
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.6
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 2.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 21.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 34.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 23.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 1.3

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 58.1
- Erythema Percentage: 18.6
- Swelling Percentage: 15.6
- Induration Percentage: 8.1
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 40.9

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 12.1
- Fatigue Percentage: 25.9
- Myalgia Percentage: 18.5
- Headache Percentage: 15.8
- Chills Percentage: 14.0

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 7.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 39.6
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.4
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 61.7
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.4
- Platelets (K): Mean: 245
- Platelets (K) SD: 36
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 3.2
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 14.4
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.5

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1045, Description: myalgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1045, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1025, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Vaccination day 4: 12 subjects received scheduled dose
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C
- T-cell assay batch B10 processed, results QC'd

### Notes
- Week 10: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 107 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
